front.title: Extension of GSMP for optical burst switching

abstract.t: In this draft, we propose the extension of General Switch Management Protocol (GSMP) for optical data burst switching control. This document describes node architecture and reservation management using GSMP interface for data burst switching in optical domain. Particularly, we propose a reservation request message which is extended to the existing GSMP protocol. It contains the information about offset time and burst length to control data burst in optical switch.
